title: Command Used nikto host http19216819666
extract: Nikto support scanning multiple hosts in the same session via a text file of host names or IPs. Instead of giving a host name or IP for the -h ( -host ) option, a file name can be given. A file of hosts must be formatted as one host per line, with the port number(s) at the end of each line.
extract_html: Nikto support scanning multiple hosts in the same session via a text file of host names or IPs. Instead of giving a host name or IP for the -h ( -host ) option, a file name can be given. A file of hosts must be formatted as one host per line, with the port number(s) at the end of each line.
